ygData.messageBody:
>I'm going to assume this is just a rumor. I wouldn't see the point of
building another mage type except >Wizard if this were true. That would
kind of throw the balance of character classes off a bit. Wizard's >would
be everywhere! I could be wrong.....
>
>Valacian - 22nd Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony


Possibly a rumor, ... some basis on the rumor was my experience in Beta,
however this does not seem to be the case now. Was playing a 3rd level wiz
and accidently bought a magician spell. When i tried to scribe it I got the
message 'This spell does not come available to you until level 32' (or
something close to that).

I rechecked the spell stats and it was strictly Magician type. Recently i
tried the same thing (Playing an Enchanter) and bought a 1st level wiz
spell, but i did not recieve anything other than 'This spell cannot be used
by your class' .. so perhaps what i saw in beta has been ommited now. I
think the only way that different classes can use one another's spells is
ONLY if the same spell is available to different classes (Like Gate or
Invisibility)
